name: Unidentified Flying Monsters
description:
You are just a fish living a peacefull life near the beach...

Wait a minute, what are those flying things!? I think they were called "seagulls", but we can't let them eat us! Survive from them as long as you can!

Controls

Use the arrows or WASD to swim around!

Credits
  • Game by Oscar Moreno (Asdonaur)
  • Music by Marllon Silva (xDeviruchi)
